Message: Hi, I’m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form

To add users to your organization in News Break, follow these steps:

1. Access Account Management.
2. Click ‘Access’ under your preferred Organization.
3. Select ‘Add User’ on the right-hand side of your screen.
4. Fill in the email address of the new user and their organization role (Admin or Employee) and submit.

Once submitted, the new user will be prompted to make an account via their email. For more details, you can check out our guide here: [Account Management Guide](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17539290349709-Account-Management-Guide).
How can I verify My organization?

To verify your organization, please provide the following information by emailing adsupport@newsbreak.com with the subject line: Business Verification:

- Company's full address
- Company's legal entity name
- Account Email
- Company's EHID or DUNS number
- Primary contact person's name
- Company's phone number
- Business URL

Once we receive this information, we will conduct a thorough review and update you on your account status. If you have any questions, feel free to reach out!
